name: Spin & Roll
description:
Spin, roll and launch your way to victory in this fun action puzzle game for all ages, designed to test your reflexes, skillful movement and watchful eye!



Carefully weave your way through 25 stages of beautifully crafted, colourful stages chocked-full of hazardous spike traps, menacing slimes, laser beams, fire-spouting turrets and angry Glorbs!



With a barrage of levels to keep you rolling, a hidden bonus mode to test even the hardiest of enthusiasts, hidden collectibles and an extra pack of stages that mix up the classic Spin & Roll formula, there's plenty of content to tackle!



There's a whole heap of hazards and traps to watch out for when you're spinning your way through the weaving, winding stages of Spin & Roll. Some just need dodging, others may hunt you down...



Master your progress on each stage by collecting your winning trophy. Can you beat the level faster? Find all of the secret tokens? Get to the goal without losing a ball? Grab the best trophy you can on each stage and you may just unlock an even more challenging take on familiar stages...



We're following up our February 1st launch with the first of our completely free content updates: Mekanika! Even more levels packed with completely new hazards, enemies and more!

Savania is committed to our Content Promise - working to provide you with plenty of completely free DLC to continue supporting this game after launch. We believe in giving back to the players who help to support our games <3
